Package org.springcorebankapp.user

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
org.springcorebankapp.user.UserService
@Service @Transactional public class UserService extends Object
Service class that provides business logic for user management.

This service contains methods for creating users, retrieving user information, and managing user accounts. It interacts with the UserRepository for user data persistence and with the AccountService for account creation and management.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

  • Constructor Details

    • UserService

      public UserService()

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      public void createUser(String login)
      Creates a new user with the specified login.

      This method checks if the login is already taken. If not, it creates a new User with the provided login and adds a default account for the user. If the login is taken, a LoginIsBusyException is thrown.

      Parameters:
      login - the login for the new user
      Throws:
      LoginIsBusyException - if the login is already in use by another user

    • findUserById

      public User findUserById(int id)
      Finds a user by their unique ID.

      This method retrieves the user with the given ID from the database. If the user is not found, a UserNotFoundException is thrown.

      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user to find
      Returns:
      the User with the specified ID
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if no user with the given ID is found

    • getAllUsers

      public List<User> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves all users from the database.

      This method fetches all the users present in the database and logs the operation.

      Returns:
      a list of all Users
